Texts.Chs:
从梦境的本质中提炼出来...并酿制成酒。 可能不安全。
^cyan;+^white;17^cyan;防御^gray;，^red;发狂^gray;, ^white;35% ^red;减速^gray，^red;醉酒^gray;(^white;持续2m^gray;)^reset;
Texts.Eng:
Honed from the very essence of dreams...and made into booze. Probably not safe.
^cyan;+^white;17 ^cyan;Defense ^gray;, ^red;Insane^gray;, ^white;35% ^red;Slow ^gray;, ^red;Drunk ^gray;(^white;2m^gray;)^reset;
